episodes.title: THE Brain Expert: THIS Will Heal Your MIND | Dr. Amen & Carl Lentz (Secrets You Didn't Know)
episodes.description: Find Dr. Amen https://www.instagram.com/doc_amen/?hl=en In this enlightening conversation, Carl Lentz sits down with renowned psychiatrist Dr. Daniel Amen. Carl is a patient of Dr. Amen, & he dives deep to explore crucial topics related to mental and physical well-being. They dive deep into: Addiction: Understanding the roots of addiction and effective ways to overcome it. Creating a Healthy Brain: Tips and strategies to nurture and maintain a healthy brain. Avoiding Marijuana Consumption: Insights into the effects of marijuana on the brain and why avoiding it can be beneficial. And Much More: Additional advice and wisdom on living a healthier, more balanced life. Dr. Amen, with his vast expertise in brain health, provides invaluable guidance and practical tips that can transform your approach to mental wellness. Whether you're struggling with addiction, looking to enhance your brain health, or curious about the impact of marijuana, this conversation is packed with actionable advice and thought-provoking insights. Don’t miss this chance to learn from two influential voices on how to lead a healthier, more fulfilling life. episodes.title: Lights On with Carl Lentz | Trailer
episodes.description: “Lights on” will be available on 06.04.24. My choices, and the road toward recovery taught me how helpful it is to have people share vulnerably the impact of their bad choices, the pain they caused, and the pain they suffered that led them to make those choices, and what they’ve discovered can be helpful and healing. My hope is that in sharing those things from my story and asking others to share theirs, it will be helpful, hopeful and healing. I’m thankful for where we are today. To be confident of the future, content in the present and healed enough to speak to the past is miraculous. If we can make it, anybody can…thank you for all the love and support!
